    • Method Detail

      • buildConnection

        public static javax.net.ssl.HttpsURLConnection buildConnection(java.lang.String address)
        Builds a connection to TAXII server
        Parameters:
        address - String containing the address to build the connection to
        Returns:
        HttpsURLConnection object connected to TAXII server

      • inboxMessage

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document inboxMessage(java.lang.String msgId,
                                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extHdrs,
                                                java.lang.String message,
                                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> sourceSubscription,
                                                java.util.List<ContentBlock> contentBlocks)
        Constructs a TAXII Inbox_Message XML message and returns the Document object
        Parameters:
        msgId - the message_id
        extHdrs - a HashMap containing all extended headers (can be null)
        message - text for the Message tag
        sourceSubscription - a HashMap containing all Source_Subscription attributes and tags (feed_name, subscription_id, Inclusive_Begin_Timestamp, Inclusive_End_Timestamp)
        contentBlocks - an ArrayList of ContentBlock objects
        Returns:
        a Document object with the given parameters. The document will represent a TAXII Inbox Message. Usage Example: Document im = inboxMessage("12345", null, "Here is my message", null, contentBlocks);

      • pollRequest

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document pollRequest(java.lang.String msgId,
                                               java.lang.String fN,
                                               java.lang.String subId,
                                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extHdrs,
                                               java.lang.String bTime,
                                               java.lang.String eTime,
                                               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> cBind)
        Constructs a TAXII Poll_Request XML message and returns the Document object
        Parameters:
        msgId - the message_id
        fN - the feed name
        subId - the subscription_id
        extHdrs - a HashMap containing all extended headers (can be null)
        bTime - the Exclusive_Begin_Timestamp value
        eTime - the Inclusive_End_Timestamp value
        cBind - set of acceptable Content Bindings for this request
        Returns:
        a Document object with the given parameters. The document will represent a TAXII poll request. Usage Example: Document pr = pollRequest("12345", "myFeed", "12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef", null, "2014-05-24T22:23:00.000000Z", null, null);
